name: Nano Input Hood
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Inactive Nano Input Hood" "248815" a Swatch of Alien Fabric ( ie : #L "Fuzzy Swatch of Alien Fabric" "249704" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ a special upgrade + Inactive Nano Input Hood = a Special Hood ( ie : #L "Fuzzy Nano Input Hood" "248764" ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Fuzzy Swatch of Alien Fabric" "249704" = #L "Fuzzy Nano Input Hood" "250460" ------------------------------ #L "Wrinkled Swatch of Alien Fabric" "248822" = #L "Wrinkled Nano Input Hood" "248758" ------------------------------ #L "Phasing Swatch of Alien Fabric" "248776" = #L "Phasing Nano Input Hood" "248814" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Great head item which you can level by right clicking it.
